kai.conditions¶

Module Contents¶

Functions¶

summarize_observing_conditions(fitsFiles)

Summarize the observing conditions for a set of fits files. Select
kai.conditions.summarize_observing_conditions(fitsFiles)[source]¶

Summarize the observing conditions for a set of fits files. Select out the dates and times, range of airmasses, temperature, pressure, humidity, and water vapor column.
